product_name: Dynafit Beast 16 Randonee Bindings with 120mm Brakes - 2014/2015
long_description: Built for freeride skiers who want to reach the summit of a backcountry peak and top it off with an aggressive line down, the Beast 16 randonee bindings with 120mm-wide brakes deliver top performance.
short_description: Built for freeride skiers who want to reach the summit of a backcountry peak and top it off with an aggressive line down, the Beast 16 randonee bindings with 120mm-wide brakes deliver top performance.
